name: Digit Daze
description:
Digit Daze is a fun and challenging mathematical puzzle game. You are given a main number less than 100 and one to four color goals to complete with the 16 provided digits. Each color goal can require 2 to 4 numbers to reach the main number. As you complete the number of digits or the color total goals, the color goals will highlight. When all color goals are completed you can progress to the next puzzle. Each puzzle is randomly generated for and endless variety of mathematical puzzle combinations to complete. Challenge your mind and have fun while you do it. Enjoy endless mathematical puzzles with Digit Daze.

Features:
Mathematical Puzzles
2-4 Number Combinations Per Color Goal
1-4 Color Goals Per Puzzle
Endless Puzzles/Levels
Randomized Puzzles
